pages.text: There are quite a few changes done to recipes and features in the mods inside this pack. $(br2)Pneumaticcraft requires steel now instead of iron and the compressed iron has been renamed to Pressure treated Steel.$(br)

Create mod now requires steel for some machinery too. Also Rosequartz from the nether is compatible now. $(br2)ComputerCraft + I am Music Player + Watermedia have been completely rebalanced to all require electronic components and steel.$(br)

Immersive Engineering now requires Create mod assembly for certain items similar to the precision mechanism. Some items also require mechanisms from create and its addons. $(br2)ColdSweat has been configured to work with almost all blocks that should be warm or cold including machinery.$(br)

Eureka has been rebalanced by removing the Ship Engine and replacing it with the Rotaton Engine which requires a create mod power source to function. Balloons now require helium which is found in the end.$(br)
